sections.background: Enables deploying models in JavaScript environments, such as in a web browser or server side through Node.js. TensorFlow.js also supports defining models in JavaScript and training directly in the web browser using a Keras-like API.

metadata.concept_definition: Enables deploying models in JavaScript environments, such as in a web browser or server side through Node.js. TensorFlow.js also supports defining models in JavaScript and training directly in the web browser using a Keras-like API.
